column4: hej. help! i have AD198x sound chip on my compaq nx6310. and then i play music sound quality is so bad. but in windows its good!wha i should do_
hej. help! i have AD198x sound chip on my compaq nx6310. and then i play music sound quality is so bad. but in windows its good!wha i should do_
load up alsa-mixer with some music playing and make sure the wave/pcm/master levels are not maxed, and also try muting and unmuting some of the settings further down
